song.title: HNK-Dontcry
song.info:
This is part of a group of modules called from the author "Area 05: Hokuto No Ken".
"This area is *!* recommended *!* to all those people KenShiro's fanatic. (Hokuto No Ken also called NorthStar) These modules below are quite small because they were composed for a videogame. (never realized...) Therefore some instruments could not have a great audio quality ...but this is balanced from the high quality of remixes!
HNK-Dontcry: "Soundtrack for sad moments... (eg: when someone dies)"
